structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

law.catch_line: Team Metro Director; Enforcement Power and Duties.

text.section:
Sec. 19-6. Team Metro Director; Enforcement Power and Duties.
The Director shall be responsible for the enforcement of this Chapter and shall have the authority to amend and modify the administration of the Department's operating procedures to carry out this Chapter.
